Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<MessageToClient>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game
extends Observable<MessageToClient>
Game contains every object of model Controller modify the model only through this class that allows to change the state of the game

    • sendPossibleActionMoveState

      public void sendPossibleActionMoveState() throws InvalidStateException
      Notify to remoteView of currentPlayer every possible action that currentPlayer can do when currentState is GameState.MOVE
      Throws:
      InvalidStateException - if currentState isn't GameState.MOVE

    • sendPossibleActionBuildState

      public void sendPossibleActionBuildState() throws InvalidStateException
      Notify to remoteView of currentPlayer every possible action that currentPlayer can do when currentState is GameState.BUILD
      Throws:
      InvalidStateException - if currentState isn't GameState.BUILD

    • sendPossibleActionPowerState

      public void sendPossibleActionPowerState() throws InvalidStateException
      Notify to remoteView of currentPlayer every possible Position where currentPlayer can use his power
      Throws:
      InvalidStateException - if currentState isn't GameState.MOVE

      Method that set the chosen cards in deck.
      Parameters:
      godNames - is required as a not null List (@String) which contains the name of the god chosen by player god like
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if List (@String) contains equal values.
      java.lang.NullPointerException

      Method that do initial operation for player before call his method In particular it sets this.currentPosition
      Parameters:
      startPos - is the position selected
      Throws:
      NotPresentWorkerException - if in startPos there is not a worker
      java.lang.NullPointerException

    • canMoveWorker

      public boolean canMoveWorker​(Position movePos) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, NotPresentWorkerException
      Method that check if a worker of this.currentPlayer can move in movePos
      Parameters:
      movePos - is a not null Position where move the worker Modifies currentPosition
      Returns:
      true if the move is possible
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException
      NotPresentWorkerException

    • getMovePositions

      Parameters:
      workerPos - Position occupied by worker that player want to move
      Returns:
      List of Position that contains Position where the player can move
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if workerPos is null

    • moveWorker

      public void moveWorker​(Position movePos) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Parameters:
      movePos - is a not null Position where move the worker Modifies this.currentPosition
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException

    • canPlayerBuildWithSelectedWorker

      public boolean canPlayerBuildWithSelectedWorker()
      Returns:
      true iff currentPlayer can build with his selected worker in an adjacent cell.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true iff the usage of power is valid
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException

      Returns:
      List of Position that contains Position where the player can use his power
      Throws:

    • removeCurrentPlayer

      public void removeCurrentPlayer()
      Remove current player and delete his workers from the board. Update the current player and set the state to start the new turn Notify this change to remoteView
